dialogue.text: 3 months later... on the other side of the ocean...
In a lively town at the foothills of the Preheats...
Okay... I think I'm going the right way.
Father said to just keep going straight, but the roads here are so winding-!
Ah-! I forgot to tell Sour I'm on my way! I'll do that right...
How cruel my fate...
There's... no signs anywhere. And it's too late out to find anyone to ask... I'm... I'm stuck.
N-no, please! I don't want to miss the boat-! What do I do..?
Un grito de angustia no quedará sin respuesta.
H-huh?
Detén tus lagrimas, viajera. Estoy aquí para ayudarte.
¿Por qué esa mirada?
Ah, ahem... my apologies. It slipped my mind that those who lose their way here don't usually speak our language.
If you are lost, allow me to assist you.
I've never been through here on my own before, and there's no reception, and my partner is waiting for me, and-!
-ah... I'm just looking for a way to the dock.
The dock, hmm? I do know a quick route to it off the main path. I can lead you right to it.
T-thank you! You're a lifesaver, mister.
Ah, nearly forgot my manners. My name is Sweet.
Sweet... ah, a lovely name.
As for myself, you may call me... The Wayfinder.
